title: Worlds Viewing parties coming to HOYTS cinemas!

replies.body: Would be glad to see C9 6-0 on the big screen!
C9 got this,
༼ つ ◕_◕ ༽つ C9 TAKE MY ENERGY ༼ つ ◕_◕ ༽つ
More like SKT T1 6-0 ;)

Heads up New Zealanders not in Auckland, there are MANY viewing parties for you to get involved in all over NZ! =D

* Wellington = https://www.facebook.com/events/462476713932620/ 

* Hamilton = https://www.facebook.com/events/991381347580180/ 

* Christchurch = https://www.facebook.com/events/1006735886056966/ 

* Dunedin = follow https://www.facebook.com/groups/1389690251332401/ for info as it comes
Will the skin be a skin that is only available to those that go to the viewing?
I hope it is.
What would the skin code be???
We do have a code in the bags and it is different to the OPL viewing party skin :)
Will it be a generic skin or a custom one for people going to the event?

If the trend continues, it's going to a be a 1350 RP skin code.

At the OPL, they gave out Astro Nautilus and Forsaken Jayce
Christchurch :(. I guest  me and my friends got to watch it at my place  {{champion:32}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}}
https://www.facebook.com/events/1006735886056966/ MATE
No viewing party for Brisbane Southside though? What a pity...

Hey this is due to us only using cinemas that accept satellite feeds. More information [here](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/esports/pmMyAYId-why-are-there-no-viewing-parties-in-the-rest-of-new-zealand).
Perth's feed at Carousel isn't going to get severely disrupted again, is it?
I'll come to aus for this game lol get it
SKT will be holding their Second Cup for Worlds

I'm pretty sure the skin codes will be the Halloween ones, jinx, pantheon & nunu.

Oh man I hope I get jinx or panth.
the amount of cinemas this is available at is ridiculous, and a waste of money imo.
so i have attempted to buy a ticket to the Broadway cinema, but it says 'movie not found' and im unable to buy a ticket..... is it a pay when i get there??
this is for the finals on 31st that is
this is for the finals on 31st that is
so i have attempted to buy a ticket to the Broadway cinema, but it says 'movie not found' and im unable to buy a ticket..... is it a pay when i get there??
any chance we can have additional screening in Sydney? :)
will it be the same as the luna park show bag (t-shirt, skin code and other goodies)?
is this a morning or mid day thing? or a midnight thing?
Its late night so the doors open at 9.00pm and it could go until 3am. So its a late one!
Hey is there one for dunedin? Joined group but Idk if you get accepted or not, just worried not getting info, cheers {{item:3070}}
Not a HOYTS viewing party, sorry.
will there be one in the future? or talked about doing it for a cinema in dunedin? :)

Hey, me and a friend are going to the WA one.
Just out of curiosity is the skin going to be cosmic Kassadin because my mate is Kassadin main.
No, it is not going to be Kassadin.

Hmm, I'm assuming it won't be a unique skin made just for the event right?
Is it going to be legendary?

Theres no event in Canberra? :'( 
I here theres a viewing at the ANU, will rito provide skins to https://www.facebook.com/events/982797085116986/ since there are no plans to host a rito official one in Canberra :(

Hey, presently we are not supplying skins for other events. Reasoning for no Canberra HOYTS is that they do not have a theatre set up to receive the sat feed there so we are not confident that a web based feed is good enough quality for the big screen, hence we go with Sat for all the viewing parties. We are hoping HOYTS extend the number of cinemas that have the capacity in 2016.
so I live in Auckland and I was wondering if Armageddon will give out the same skins as the ones at Hoyts Sylvia Park?
Not sure but its different to the OPL ones!
Hi, there will not be skins at Armageddon as we will not be participating this year, but there will be one in the HOYTS bags.
WIll it be a 975 skin or 1350rp skin RITO TELL ME
You will have to wait and see :)
so there is no option to buy tickets ; /

[NZ](http://www.hoyts.co.nz/movies/2015/league_of_legends_2015_world_championship_finals.aspx)
[AU](http://www.hoyts.com.au/movies/2015/league_of_legends_2015_world_championship_finals.aspx)

Enjoy!

It's a shame that it will be on the same weekend as PAX Melbourne. :(

Is riot doing anything at PAX Melbourne this year ? Last year was a blast.
Hi, we won't be at PAX but there is a viewing party at Melbs HOYTS cinema.
I'm from NSW and apparently its only at Broadway...? Or are there more options...
Hey presently only at Sydney Broadway. Reasoning is that we are using satellite to guarantee the quality of the broadcast and these are the only cinemas that can take the feed.
